articles.title: NASA Astronaut Kate Rubins, Crewmates Return Safely to Earth - NASA
articles.description: NASA astronaut Kate Rubins, along with Roscosmos cosmonauts Sergey Ryzhikov and Sergey Kud-Sverchkov, returned to Earth on Saturday, following six months living and working aboard the International Space Station.

articles.title: NASA's Parker Solar Probe Sees Venus Orbital Dust Ring - NASA
articles.description: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe mission has given scientists the first complete look at Venus’ orbital dust ring, a collection of microscopic dust particles that circulates around the Sun along Venus’ orbit.
